title: Kled, the Cantankerous Cavalier, available now

replies.body: #[Did you know OCE players can do this, while no other region in League has the possibility to do it? It's pretty amazing](https://www.facebook.com/952265458117476/videos/1067334036610617/)
Inb4 kids complain about the 'holy shit' in the article. Thank you Riot, you're dying down on your censorship.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} good job possibly destroying top lane :P
